MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L21 and L30 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Bowland Drive, Dale Acre Drive, Dartmouth Drive and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:00am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed a fault on our underground cable network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:50pm on 14th January 2021
